Introduction Diseases caused by bacteria are pneumonia, meningitis (inflammation of the meninges), food poisoning etc. Bacteria are single cell organisms that produce quickly in human body. Not all bacterias are harmful for human body, but those that are harmful are termed as pathogenic bacteria. They produce chemicals called toxins that can damage tissues. Infections caused by harmful bacteria include tuberculosis, strep throat, urinary tract infections etc. The access range routes for bacteria to enter human body can be cuts, contaminated water or food, contact with an infected person, touching contaminated surfaces, breathing in exhaled droplets when infected person sneezes or coughs and so on. Symptoms of bacterial infections include frequent urination, bloody urine, fatigue, headache, irritability, vomiting, nausea, rashes, pain in ear, joint or abdomen etc. In some cases diseases caused by bacteria can be serious or life threatening. Complications may include kidney failure, severe dehydration, coma, breath shortness, high fever, inappropriate level of consciousness etc. ingredients in Dr.Reckeweg R87 The key properties in Dr.Reckeweg R 87 drops are derived from the following ingredients to treat diseases caused by bacteria - Botulinum, Salmonella, E-Coli, Proteus, Pneumococcinum, Staphylococcoinum, Scarlatinum, Tuberculinum, Streptococcinum-these ingredients acts and destroy excess bacteria. - Glandulae thymi-stimulates gland to provide bacterial immune system - Hydrastis-it acts as powerful natural anti bacterial.
